00041 
00048   inline DFLib::Proj::Report::Report(const vector<double> &theLocation,
00049                                        const double &Bearing,const double &std_dev,
00050                                        const string &theName,
00051                                      vector<string> &projArgs)
00052     : bearing(Bearing*M_PI/180.0),
00053       sigma(std_dev*M_PI/180.0)
00054   {
00055     receiverLocation = new Point(theLocation,projArgs);
00056     setReportName(theName);
00057     // Make sure our bearing is *always* 0<bearing<2pi.  If it isn't,
00058     // reset it:
00059     while (bearing < 0)
00060       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00061   }        
00062 
00063   inline DFLib::Proj::Report::~Report()
00064   {
00065     if (receiverLocation)
00066       delete receiverLocation;
00067   }
00068 
00069   inline double DFLib::Proj::Report::getReportBearingRadians() const
00070   {
00071     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<pi
00072     return bearing;
00073   }
00074   inline double DFLib::Proj::Report::getBearing() const
00075   {
00076     // always return bearing in range 0-360 degrees
00077     return (getReportBearingRadians()*180.0/M_PI);
00078   }
00079 
00080   inline double DFLib::Proj::Report::getBearingStandardDeviationRadians() const
00081   {
00082     return sigma;
00083   }
00084   inline double DFLib::Proj::Report::getSigma() const
00085   {
00086     return sigma*180/M_PI;
00087   }
00088 
00089   inline void DFLib::Proj::Report::setReceiverLocationUser(vector<double> &theLocation)
00090   {
00091     receiverLocation->setUserCoords(theLocation);
00092   }
00093 
00094   inline void DFLib::Proj::Report::setReceiverLocationMercator(vector<double> &theLocation)
00095   {
00096     receiverLocation->setXY(theLocation);
00097   }
00098 
00099   inline const vector<double> & DFLib::Proj::Report::getReceiverLocation() 
00100   { 
00101     return receiverLocation->getXY();
00102   }
00103 
00104   inline void DFLib::Proj::Report::setBearing(double Bearing)
00105   {
00106     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<pi
00107     bearing=Bearing*M_PI/180.0;
00108     while (bearing < 0)
00109       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00110   }
00111   inline void DFLib::Proj::Report::setSigma(double Sigma)
00112   {
00113     sigma=Sigma*M_PI/180;
00114   }
